definition: looper caterpillar, larva of moth in family Geometridae/inch worm
a Chinese foot/one-third of a meter/a ruler/a tape-measure/one of the three acupoints for measuring pulse in Chinese medicine/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3]
one of the characters used to represent a musical note in gongche notation, 工尺譜|工尺谱[gong1 che3 pu3]

sentences.english: The geometrid Apocheima sp. is one of the worst pest of the locust tree in Mei County.
sentences.chinese: 刺槐尺蠖是陝西省眉縣地區刺槐林的主要害蟲。

sentences.english: The underside of this inchworm measures your baby up to 24 inches.
sentences.chinese: 這尺蠖的底面措施寶寶高達24英寸。

sentences.english: And with the inchworm, he flew to where other birds needed to be measured.
sentences.chinese: 知更鳥帶著尺蠖飛到其他鳥需要被測量的地方。

sentences.english: The adorable inchworm is really the caterpillar of the geometer moth.
sentences.chinese: 可愛的尺蠖就是尺蠖毛蟲。

sentences.english: The adorable inchworm is really the caterpillar of the geometer moth.
sentences.chinese: 可愛的尺蠖就是尺蠖毛蟲。

sentences.english: Under a microscope, neurons move like little inchworms.
sentences.chinese: 在顯微鏡下，神經元像尺蠖在移動。

sentences.english: These fishy cases are reminiscent of the peppered moth in Britain.
sentences.chinese: 這些魚類事件同時讓人想起了不列顛的樺尺蠖。

sentences.english: Inchworm actuators are classified by the clamping mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 按箝位方式對尺蠖驅動器進行分類。

definition: imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
Lepidoptera (insect order including butterflies 蝶類|蝶类 and moths 蛾類|蛾类)
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
to pupate/to turn into a chrysalis
